## ‚òÅÔ∏è A Little About Me

Hey there! I‚Äôm a developer who believes in **clear, thoughtful code** and building products that genuinely serve people. I care deeply about performance, accessibility, and making things intuitive without being unnecessarily complex.

After **16+ years at The Weather Company (IBM)**, building products used by millions every day, these days I've been focusing on freelance work and passion projects that value quality, maintainability, and real-world impact.


üå± **Currently exploring:** better patterns for large applications, thoughtful uses of AI in everyday workflows, and maintaining design systems at scale


üìç **Currently based in** Woodstock, GA üçë

## ‚ú® What I‚Äôm Creating

üé™ **[Baldie Con](https://baldiecon.com)**  
A digital platform for a conference celebrating confidence, visibility, and community for people with hair loss.

A faith-based WordPress lifestyle publication focused on intentional living, gentle transformation, and soft-life practices.
